data.name: 0000 (403.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Did you find anything, Kyon?

data.name: 0001 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ah, no--not yet.

data.name: 0002 (403.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What's with that unenthusiastic response? Are you that unmotivated?

data.name: 0003 (403.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Honestly, I'm not motivated at all, but apparently I don't need to tell you that.

data.name: 0004 (403.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Here's some more resources, Kyon.

data.name: 0006 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Guh?! There's more?!

data.name: 0007 (403.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: There was a mountain of generations of graduation albums piled up in front of me.

data.name: 0008 (403.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: With new materials arriving as fast as I can read them, the pile isn't shrinking at all.

data.name: 0010 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Is this the last of it?

data.name: 0011 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It seems like there are yet more rounds to come.

data.name: 0012 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Seriously...?

data.name: 0013 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I would've loved to help, but after all I don't know her face.

data.name: 0014 (403.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Yeah, you're the only one that witnessed the mysterious pretty girl, you know?

data.name: 0015 (403.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You're the only one able to search about her.

data.name: 0016 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, since when did she get promoted to "pretty" girl.

data.name: 0017 (403.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I thought that might make you more interested in searching for her.

data.name: 0018 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What's that supposed to mean?

data.name: 0019 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I still only got a glimpse of her.

data.name: 0020 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm not confident I could find her looking at these faded graduation albums.

data.name: 0021 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I have a suggestion though.

data.name: 0022 (403.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What? Tell us.

data.name: 0023 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: How about we give up and go home?

data.name: 0024 (403.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Rejected.

data.name: 0025 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: If Miss Suzumiya is correct to deduce that the pretty girl is an alumnus of the school…

data.name: 0026 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: …she should certainly be present in this pile of graduation albums.

data.name: 0027 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It most likely wouldn't be worth giving up until we've looked through everything.

data.name: 0028 (403.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's our Koizumi. At least someone understands the importance of this search.

data.name: 0029 (403.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You should follow Koizumi's example, Kyon.

data.name: 0030 (403.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm honestly fine without following this guy's example and learning to turn into a red orb.

data.name: 0031 (403.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm gonna look for more materials as well, but that doesn't mean you can slack off, Kyon.

data.name: 0032 (403.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Koizumi, I'm sorry but give Kyon a hand, please.

data.name: 0033 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Of course, as you wish.

data.name: 0034 (403.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Then, I'll be back in a bit.

data.name: 0035 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You don't need to search that much... Ugh...

data.name: 0036 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: You're putting in an admirable effort.

data.name: 0037 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey Koizumi, stop spurring Haruhi on.

data.name: 0038 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'm merely saying what I think.

data.name: 0039 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: So, how's it going? Did you find her in any of the albums?

data.name: 0040 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Surely you've not started believing in ghosts as well?

data.name: 0041 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Well in regard to that, I myself would say I sit on the fence.

data.name: 0042 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I believe that when it's related to Miss Suzumiya I could never rule out the possibility.

data.name: 0043 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Whatever I saw, it didn't seem like a ghost.

data.name: 0044 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: My view is that if it really was caused by Haruhi...

data.name: 0045 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ...it should be a little bit more ghostly.

data.name: 0046 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Hmm... but we don't know what Miss Suzumiya's view of ghosts is.

data.name: 0047 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We'll perhaps have to subtly ask her later.

data.name: 0048 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I don't want to--you do it.

data.name: 0049 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We'll leave whether or not the mysterious pretty girl is a ghost or not aside for now.

data.name: 0050 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Having had the man-eating classroom, it's certain something is happening in this school.

data.name: 0051 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Even I can't deny that.

data.name: 0052 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's exactly why I've been saying we should end this at once…

data.name: 0053 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …and get Haruhi out of the school.

data.name: 0054 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Then afterwards, you or that "Agency" or whatever it's called can search the school...

data.name: 0055 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ...for whatever's going down to your hearts content, right?

data.name: 0056 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: This training camp was proposed by Miss Suzumiya.

data.name: 0057 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Upsetting Miss Suzumiya in such a way would be an utter misunderstanding of our problem.

data.name: 0058 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Her mood is not my problem.

data.name: 0059 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: From my point of view, I can't say the same.

data.name: 0060 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Besides it being Miss Suzumiya's desire, I still think we must continue the training camp.

data.name: 0061 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: On top of that, don't you believe we're in a comfortable position to be here…

data.name: 0062 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: …quietly searching for materials over wandering the school looking for phenomena?

data.name: 0063 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So we're buying time here?

data.name: 0064 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed, you're precisely right.

data.name: 0065 (403.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's not like I didn't already know, but this guy is pretty shrewd...

data.name: 0066 (403.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It seems like someone's mobile is ringing somewhere.

data.name: 0067 (403.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Should I tell Koizumi?

data.name: 0068 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, isn't your phone ringing?

data.name: 0069 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Oh my, you seem to be right. I hadn't realized.

data.name: 0070 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: If you wouldn't bear to excuse me for a moment.

data.name: 0071 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Oh my, that appears to be my mobile phone. Do bear with me for a moment.

data.name: 0073 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: …Yes, indeed. Understood.

data.name: 0074 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Whew, that was from the "Agency."

data.name: 0075 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Glad to hear it.

data.name: 0076 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Aren't you concerned with what they had to say?

data.name: 0077 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm not interested in your discussion about changing shifts or whatever.

data.name: 0078 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Is that so?

data.name: 0079 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Thanks to you, I didn't miss the call.

data.name: 0080 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I feel as if I owe you my gratitude…

data.name: 0081 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Don't worry about it.

data.name: 0082 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'm afraid that leaves me feeling unsatisfied.

data.name: 0083 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Oh that's right, I'll offer you this.

data.name: 0084 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What's that? Candy?

data.name: 0085 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Sweet things can help with using your brain. I'm sure it'll provide you energy for searching.

data.name: 0086 (403.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Do you have to mix essence of sarcasm into your thanks to feel satisfied or something?

data.name: 0087 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, I'll take it I guess.

data.name: 0088 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Go ahead.

data.name: 0089 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: As for the materials, I'm not certain we can expect much in regard of results.

data.name: 0090 (403.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyon, Koizumi--did you find something?

data.name: 0091 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Unfortunate though it may be, we're yet to find any sort of lead.

data.name: 0092 (403.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hey, Kyon! Don't get in Koizumi's way, okay?!

data.name: 0093 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Do not fret--I was only providing him my assistance.

data.name: 0094 (403.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You should learn to be a little more humble like Koizumi, Kyon.

data.name: 0095 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm practice his refreshing smile in front of the mirror.

data.name: 0096 (403.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Enough with the chit-chat already--there's still all these materials to search!

data.name: 0097 (403.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Look, get to work!

data.name: 0098 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm doing it. I just need to get it done, right.

data.name: 0099 (403.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm sure Haruhi will be satisfied if I just skim through them...

data.name: 0100 (403.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...and tell her that girl wasn't in any of them.

data.name: 0101 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Huh, what's this...?

data.name: 0102 (403.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Mixed within the materials was what seemed to be the Computer Society's budget application.

data.name: 0103 (403.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It documents everything they've bought with their budget the past few years.

data.name: 0104 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: This seems like it could be useful. I'll keep hold of it.

data.name: 0105 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I've got my hands full over here, so give the rest to Koizumi.

data.name: 0106 (403.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Koizumi's in the heat of his search as well, you know?

data.name: 0107 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Ah, I'll take those materials.

data.name: 0108 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: And here's a written report of what I've read so far.

data.name: 0109 (403.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I thought I should write one for future reference.

data.name: 0110 (403.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Whoa, that's our Koizumi!

data.name: 0111 (403.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Look Kyon, take these and do your best!

data.name: 0112 (403.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Damn it, that backfired…

data.name: 0113 (403.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: だいたい、キョンはＳＯＳ団の 団員としての心構えがなって

data.name: 0114 (403.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: ないのよ

data.name: 0115 (403.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: 古泉くんの爪のアカでももらって 煎じて飲んでみたらどう？

data.name: 0116 (403.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: くっ、俺の話を聞いていない

data.name: 0117 (403.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: そうだわ。こんどキョンのお茶に だけ、こっそり入れてみようかしら

data.name: 0118 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: そう言うのは、俺のいないところで 計画してくれ

data.name: 0120 (403.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: はーい、キョンくん 資料だよー！

data.name: 0121 (403.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: まだ追加があるのかよ？ 勘弁してくれ

data.name: 0122 (403.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: 妹ちゃんの方が、よっぽどやる気が あるじゃないの

data.name: 0123 (403.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: ホント？ キョンくんよりえらい？

data.name: 0124 (403.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: ええ、断然えらいわね キョンはダメダメよ

data.name: 0125 (403.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: キョンくんはダメダメだってー ダメダメー！ あははは！

data.name: 0126 (403.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ＳＯＳ団員としての適性に興味は ないが、むなしいのは何故なのか

data.name: 0127 (403.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: それもこれも、この訳の分からん 謎の事件が悪いんだ

data.name: 0128 (403.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 面倒極まりないが、これはきちんと 解決する必要がありそうだな……

data.name: 0129 (403.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: 古泉に教える

data.name: 0130 (403.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: 古泉に教えない

data.name: 0131 (403.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: 資料に目を通す

data.name: 0132 (403.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: 古泉に任せる
